about_the_game:
Step into the fantastical world of Parina and embark on an exhilarating journey through realms of magic and mystery! Sharpen your senses as you delve into this captivating hidden object adventure, where every scene is brimming with treasures waiting to be discovered. With over a dozen enchanting levels, prepare to put your keen eyesight to the test like never before!

Key features of this immersive adventure include:

Compelling Storyline: Dive deep into an immersive narrative that unfolds as you progress through each hidden object scene. Join Parina on her quest through medieval fantasy, where every find brings you closer to unraveling the secrets of this enchanting world.

Accessible Difficulty: Whether you're a seasoned explorer or a novice adventurer, the game offers a casual level of difficulty suitable for players of all ages and skill levels. Everyone can enjoy the thrill of the hunt!

Challenging Objectives: Each scene presents a unique set of challenges, with a list of hidden objects that must be located to unlock the next level. Can you uncover them all and unravel the mysteries that lie ahead?

Helpful Hints: Feeling stuck? Fear not! A one-time random hint per level is at your disposal to guide you on your journey. Use it wisely to overcome any obstacles that stand in your way.

Don't miss your chance to join Parina on her epic medieval fantasy adventure! Prepare to be spellbound by the wonders that await as you embark on this unforgettable quest. Are you ready to uncover the secrets of the enchanted realm?

name: Parina's Demon Lair Adventure

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Dual Core 3ghz +
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2 gb
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Dual Core 3ghz +
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2 gb
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
